programme.title: Single in Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Highway Family
programme.desc: A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: Gyeong-ahs Daughter
programme.desc: After her husband passed away, Gyeong-ah relies on her daughter Yeon-su. But they barely meet each other. One day, Gyeong-ah gets an anonymous message about Yeon-su and goes into trauma...

programme.title: Ordinary Person
programme.desc: Sung-jin is a police officer involved in a conspiracy after he arrested a suspected murderer by chance. Gyu-nam make use of Sung-jins weakness, his family, to strike a deal with him.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: For the Emperor
programme.desc: Former baseball player involved in fixing game was recruited to work for private loan company. He also falls for bar owner Yeon-Soo, and slowly unleashes his endless desire and ambition...

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the targets large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago in the past. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon and the Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Unfair
programme.desc: A protest against urban renewal leads to death of a cop and a teen. The boys father was arrested for the cops death. A young attorney is assigned to defend the father.

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the worlds most legendary con man.

programme.title: Exhuma
programme.desc: Exhuma follows two shamans, a feng shui expert and an undertaker as they seek to help a Korean-American family tormented by an ancestral curse.

programme.title: Gate
programme.desc: A group of five conspired for one last heist, yet secrets inside the vault are large enough to overthrow the country.

programme.title: 12.12: the Day
programme.desc: Based on the 12.12 Military Insurrection. Chun Doo-Gwang staged a coup. Lee Tae-Shin is a commander who fights against Chun. The chaos led Seoul to an unexpected direction.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: When a high school gym teacher helps his student track down her missing friend, he finds himself faced with a conspiracy related to her disappearance.

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: Sisters on the Road
programme.desc: After her mothers death, Myung-eun meets her sister Myung-ju. They do not share the same father and decided to travel together to find Myung-euns father. A secret of her father reveals...

programme.title: Punch-drunk Love
programme.desc: Bok-seo gave up to be a soccer player after an injury. He meets Bok-hee and falls in love with her. Bok-hee feels unsure but she appreciates his sincerity, leading to something special...

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Worst Woman
programme.desc: Eun-hee is an actress with poor acting and she acts in her life. She creates different characters when she dates a man. Eventually, her lies are tangled up and everything is messed up...

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E074
programme.desc: La sorpresa se apodera de Nicols cuando Victoria, para demostrarle que ella es tan malvada como el cree y darle una razon para odiarla, admite haber matado a Leopoldo Alcoy. Fernanda contrata a Grillo, un hombre que se va a encargar de secuestrar a Hilario para darle una buena paliza; Leopoldo sabe que tiene que darle explicaciones a su familia de los motivos que tuvo para desaparecer, pero primero quiere conversar a solas con Federico sobre lo ocurrido. Victoria le confa a Clementina que le dijo a Nicols que fue ella quien mato a Leopoldo porque est convencida de que ni un milagro va a acabar con el odio entre ellos.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E075
programme.desc: Nicols se siente avergonzado cuando Victoria le enumera todas las veces que ha credo en el a pesar de todo; sin embargo, esta vez, ella no est dispuesta a perdonarle tanta injusticia. Yosmir se niega a terminar su relacion con Eugenia por complacer a Yajaira. Florencia se impresiona cuando Nicols, aparte de revelarle que Leopoldo sigue con vida y fue Federico quien le disparo, termina su relacion con ella. La ilusion de Hansen de poder lograr que Adelaida corresponda a su amor aumenta cuando la mujer admite que est abriendose a la posibilidad de amarlo. Fernanda promete a Nicols que le va a devolver Cantarrana a los Guanipa siempre y cuando el se case con Florencia Guanipa esa misma semana.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E84
programme.desc: Al encontrar a Max y Camila abrazados, Octavia le pide a Camila que deje a Ezequiel pes ella lo ama. Camila, rechaza esa peticion pes interfiere en sus planes e intereses. En un juego de palabras con Camila, Ezequiel trata de desenmascarar la traicion.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E85
programme.desc: Max besa a Camila y le ruega que huyan juntos. Son sorprendidos por Ezequiel quien con odio pone un arma en la frente de su hijo, lo golpea. Fausto le da las ltimas instrucciones a Anton de eliminar a Ezequiel pero Torrealba llega. Culmina la boda. Se oye un disparo.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E104
programme.desc: In the best of performances, Pastora swears she doesnt mind going to jail as long as Raul is safe.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E105
programme.desc: In tears, Illis assures Pastora that she only feels sorry for her; the enraged woman shoots in all directions.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E104
programme.desc: They are alone together and Alberto insists on knowing who killed his father, because he still doesnt believe her. Hurt, he claims all the damage she did to him and challenges her to prove the truth she speaks of. The Chief of Police informs Omar of a movement that drug traffickers are making with medical instruments and equipment, apparently to make a change of face.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E80
programme.desc: Los Perroni se impresionan ante lo ordinarios que son los miembros de la familia Chaparro, con quienes tendrn que compartir su casa debido a la exigencias de Adriana.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E81
programme.desc: Angustiados porque la polica no ha podido dar con el paradero de Azalea y la nia, Adriana y Cesar regresan a la casa Palacios, donde descubren que Carlos Ral los espera.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E82
programme.desc: Adriana logra llevarse a Tatianita mientras Carlos Ral queda enfrentndose a los delincuentes por defender a su madre.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E075
programme.desc: Nicols se siente avergonzado cuando Victoria le enumera todas las veces que ha credo en el a pesar de todo; sin embargo, esta vez, ella no est dispuesta a perdonarle tanta injusticia. Yosmir se niega a terminar su relacion con Eugenia por complacer a Yajaira. Florencia se impresiona cuando Nicols, aparte de revelarle que Leopoldo sigue con vida y fue Federico quien le disparo, termina su relacion con ella. La ilusion de Hansen de poder lograr que Adelaida corresponda a su amor aumenta cuando la mujer admite que est abriendose a la posibilidad de amarlo. Fernanda promete a Nicols que le va a devolver Cantarrana a los Guanipa siempre y cuando el se case con Florencia Guanipa esa misma semana.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E076 - Episodio 76
programme.desc: A Nicols le parece increble que Fernanda le este pidiendo que se case con Florencia a cambio de devolverle Cantarrana a los Guanipa; la seora le sugiere que aproveche la oportunidad porque, si no lo hace, se va a quedar sin Victoria y sin la ltima posibilidad de regresarle la felicidad. Hilario evidencia ante Florencia lo mal que est porque siente que no sabe querer a nadie; ella, por su parte, est destrozada por haber terminado con Nicols; por primera vez Guanipa admite no estar en capacidad de ofrecerle nada a la joven. Felipe le confa a Nicols que el querer ayudar a Antonieta a salir de su depresion solo ha empeorado las cosas porque ella se est ilusionando; Del Casal, por su parte, le revela a su amigo que va a casarse con Florencia porque esa es la nica manera de poder devolverle a Victoria un pedazo de la felicidad que el le quito.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E85
programme.desc: Max besa a Camila y le ruega que huyan juntos. Son sorprendidos por Ezequiel quien con odio pone un arma en la frente de su hijo, lo golpea. Fausto le da las ltimas instrucciones a Anton de eliminar a Ezequiel pero Torrealba llega. Culmina la boda. Se oye un disparo.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E86
programme.desc: Total caos en la iglesia despues del disparo. Max herido. Ezequiel, la toma del brazo y la aleja de all, aunque siente pesar por su hijo. Fausto y Roger son los protagonistas de este asesinato frustrado. Ezequiel y Camila se dicen crudas verdades.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E105
programme.desc: In tears, Illis assures Pastora that she only feels sorry for her; the enraged woman shoots in all directions.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E106
programme.desc: Baudilio, out of his mind, tries to hang Pastora while demanding that the woman confess to him if she murdered Misael.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E105
programme.desc: Alberto goes to see Claudio in his cell and complains about his cowardice, demanding to know who killed Marco Aurelio. Claudio insists that Lorena did it and Alberto presses him to tell him if there is someone else involved, but Claudio protects Gertrudis while denying that he was the one who fired the gun - Mara Lourdes offers Patricia as a last negotiation before going to a new trial, 12 years in prison for Malena and 6 years for Isabel - Lorena locates and meets Paco in a cafe in the city.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E106
programme.desc: Malena and Alfonso are ready to get married, and Alberto will be one of their witnesses. Unable to contain himself any longer, Ricardo interrupts the meeting between Don Lucio and Mara Bonita, wanting to know what they are discussing. Lorena confronts Norma, connects the dots, and realizes that she might be the key to uncovering Gertrudis.

programme.desc: Angustiados porque la polica no ha podido dar con el paradero de Azalea y la nia, Adriana y Cesar regresan a la casa Palacios, donde descubren que Carlos Ral los espera.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E82
programme.desc: Adriana logra llevarse a Tatianita mientras Carlos Ral queda enfrentndose a los delincuentes por defender a su madre.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E83
programme.desc: Carlos Ral acusa gran sorpresa cuando Ninoska se presenta ante el con un nio que asegura que es su hijo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E076 - Episodio 76
programme.desc: A Nicols le parece increble que Fernanda le este pidiendo que se case con Florencia a cambio de devolverle Cantarrana a los Guanipa; la seora le sugiere que aproveche la oportunidad porque, si no lo hace, se va a quedar sin Victoria y sin la ltima posibilidad de regresarle la felicidad. Hilario evidencia ante Florencia lo mal que est porque siente que no sabe querer a nadie; ella, por su parte, est destrozada por haber terminado con Nicols; por primera vez Guanipa admite no estar en capacidad de ofrecerle nada a la joven. Felipe le confa a Nicols que el querer ayudar a Antonieta a salir de su depresion solo ha empeorado las cosas porque ella se est ilusionando; Del Casal, por su parte, le revela a su amigo que va a casarse con Florencia porque esa es la nica manera de poder devolverle a Victoria un pedazo de la felicidad que el le quito.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E077
programme.desc: Fernanda se complace cuando Florencia acepta ayudarla a continuar su guerra contra los Guanipa; la seora Alcoy asegura que juntas se van a encargar de poner las cosas en el lugar en que deben estar. La impresion se apodera de Florencia cuando Zambrano le revela que fue Rosendo Zapata, su padre, quien asesino a Jaimito Del Casal. Victoria asegura a Nicols que para ella es ms importante soar con regresar a Cantarrana que volver con el; el joven entiende su sentir y, antes de irse, la besa con desesperacion. Victoria le confa a Adelaida que siente la necesidad de odiar a Nicols para no dejar que su corazon vuelva a sentir la ilusion de que existe la posibilidad de una reconciliacion entre ellos.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E86
programme.desc: Total caos en la iglesia despues del disparo. Max herido. Ezequiel, la toma del brazo y la aleja de all, aunque siente pesar por su hijo. Fausto y Roger son los protagonistas de este asesinato frustrado. Ezequiel y Camila se dicen crudas verdades.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E87
programme.desc: Ezequiel reprocha a Camila querer fugarse con su hijo Max, ella lo niega. Pero el ya no le cree y duda de si debe o no ayudarla. Camila reacciona y le exige que cumpla con su palabra. La situacion de Max es estable pero delicada. Camila asiste al hospital donde Astrid trata de agredirla.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E106
programme.desc: Baudilio, out of his mind, tries to hang Pastora while demanding that the woman confess to him if she murdered Misael.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E107
programme.desc: In the clinic waiting room, Pastora pretends to worry about Baudilios health.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E106
programme.desc: Malena and Alfonso are ready to get married, and Alberto will be one of their witnesses. Unable to contain himself any longer, Ricardo interrupts the meeting between Don Lucio and Mara Bonita, wanting to know what they are discussing. Lorena confronts Norma, connects the dots, and realizes that she might be the key to uncovering Gertrudis.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E107
programme.desc: Gertrudis wants Malena to go to jail to teach her a lesson for defying her and to reiterate who holds the power, which is why she demands Mara Lourdes to continue the negotiation with Patricia; later, when she decides that the punishment has been enough, she will help her daughter to be set free.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E10 - Edge of the Storm
programme.desc: As the temperature plummets, the Keefer brothers fight their way down stream through freezing water and strong headwinds as they hope to reach their extraction site before the arctic storm lays claim to it.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E09 - Operation Moonshine
programme.desc: Montana game wardens try to catch suspects who illegally kill animals. Also, one of the wardens gets a chance to pause from enforcing hunting rules and goes on a mule deer hunt for himself.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:E08 - No Short Cuts
programme.desc: Tim demands a lot of everyone around him, especially during a cave rescue, which he describes as the worst kind of rescue.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E01 - Introduction to Military Special Forces
programme.desc: "Special Operations" are special divisions of military, police or intelligence services that are highly qualified in specific areas of urban warfare and in a variety of special weapons and technology.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E01 - At All Costs
programme.desc: Ivan goes on a journey to save his friends nineteen rhinos from the poaching epidemic now sweeping through South Africa. The solution: a logistical nightmare of transporting the entire herd to a secure location 600 miles across the country.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E22 - Harry The Mysterious Prince
programme.desc: Despite all the media buzz, much of it not exactly flattering, Harry remains a bit of an enigma. This engaging documentary offers fresh insights and footage to shed light on a royal prince who has dealt with both heartache and scandals.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E33 - Prince Edward and Sophie Rhys-Jones
programme.desc: The Real Story takes us inside a simple royal love tale. It offers a glimpse behind the scenes of how a Prince ended up falling for a girl from a regular middle-class family.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E11 - After the Drop
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer recount their most memorable moments from this years journey to Alaskas Brooks Range.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E12 - The Keefer Brothers
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers look back on one of their favorite moments of this years adventure.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E10 - Operation Big Horn
programme.desc: Have you ever been curious about what happens to seized trophy animals? Well show you today. Join game wardens as they keep an eye on hunting activities involving big horn sheep. Flathead Lake is bursting with festive vibes during the 4th of July. Lets make sure it stays safe.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E01 - Meet Island Air
programme.desc: Thousands of outdoor adventure seekers flock to Kodiak Island to experience the wilds of Alaska through hunting, fishing and wildlife viewing expeditions, and Island Air Service makes those once-in-a-lifetime quests a reality. Flying in fog, rain, snow or sleet and moving outdoorsmen, locals, supplies and materials to the farthest corners of the island, Its all in a days run for a Kodiak bush pilot and the staff and crew of Island Air.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E02 - Introduction to Police Special Operations
programme.desc: As warfare has evolved, many military techniques and technologies have been adapted for use in urban settings by police units around the world. This episode provides viewers with an intimate perspective on what it feels like to be "inside the heads" of special police personnel, and how their use of military-style strategies and equipment allows them to save lives. From riot control in South Africa and the lessons learned from its excesses, to Los Angeles Police Chief Robert Gates creation of an elite police S.W.A.T team, CQB will showcase how, over the past 30 years, the fight against urban crime has evolved into a military scenario, with both sides using increasingly complex weaponry and tactics.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E09 - Wild Boars, Wild Nights Part 1
programme.desc: Manny hunts wild eurasian boars with a spear, both day and night. Oh - and Manny gets bitten by his best friend!

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E10 - Wild Boars, Wild Nights Part 2
programme.desc: Bring out the dogs! Manny learns the most effective way to hunt wild boar.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E02 - The Heart of the Conflict
programme.desc: Investigating a string of murdered lions, Ivan gets to the very heart of an ancient conflict between humans and lions. The outcome will test Ivans own core values about cultural

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E01 - Into the Unknown
programme.desc: In the season premiere, brothers Chris and Casey Keefer are dropped in the wilderness of New Zealand with virtually nothing. They must quickly adapt to their new environment or face life threatening consequences.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E02 - White Water
programme.desc: The adrenaline has worn off for Chris and Casey, and the jet lag has set in. The brothers face frigid temperatures and unpredictable whitewater rapids. When they try to navigate the rough waterways, their safety is threatened.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E11 - Operation Rogers Pass
programme.desc: Montana Game Warden Bryan Golie lends a hand to a hunter who gets hurt out in the woods. Meanwhile, other wardens track down some hunters who try to skip the check station, leading to unexpected outcomes.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E02 - Fight or Flight
programme.desc: While on a routine sightseeing flight, a massive storm has the pilots fighting to keep their passengers safe.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E03 - Russian Army in Chechnya
programme.desc: After the fall of the soviet union many countries remained in dispute in the early nineties despite eastern Europes independence. In 1994 a bitter conflict broke out between the forces of the Chechen independence movement and the Russian regular army. Despite overwhelming manpower, weaponry and air support, the Russian forces were unable to establish effective permanent control over the mountainous area due to many successful Chechen guerrilla raids. Improvised Explosive Devices were one of the most effective methods employed in these disastrous raids and were the back drop to many Close Quarter Battle scenarios exchanged between the two sides.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E01 - Wildest Chase for Wild Boar
programme.desc: Manny is in the Florida woods hunting wild boar with his spears.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E02 - The Island Boar
programme.desc: Manny embarks on a hunting adventure for wild boar on a small island in the middle of a Florida lake.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E03 - One Rhino at a Time
programme.desc: While visiting a secret orphanage that cares for rescued baby rhinos, Ivan discovers the blood, sweat, tears that goes into saving this endangered species. An emergency phone call sends him on an adventure with a group of local heroes to save the next newly orphaned rhino.

In 1994 a bitter conflict broke out between the forces of the Chechen independence movement and the Russian regular army. Despite overwhelming manpower, weaponry and air support, the Russian forces were unable to establish effective permanent control over the mountainous area due to many successful Chechen guerrilla raids. Improvised Explosive Devices were one of the most effective methods employed in these disastrous raids and were the back drop to many Close Quarter Battle scenarios exchanged between the two sides.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E01 - Wildest Chase for Wild Boar
programme.desc: Manny is in the Florida woods hunting wild boar with his spears.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E02 - The Island Boar
programme.desc: Manny embarks on a hunting adventure for wild boar on a small island in the middle of a Florida lake.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E03 - One Rhino at a Time
programme.desc: While visiting a secret orphanage that cares for rescued baby rhinos, Ivan discovers the blood, sweat, tears that goes into saving this endangered species. An emergency phone call sends him on an adventure with a group of local heroes to save the next newly orphaned rhino.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E26 - Prince William A Royal Portrait
programme.desc: Explore the exciting and intriguing life of the future king, Prince William, in this engaging documentary.

programme.title: Diana: In Search of Happiness
programme.desc: Experience an in-depth look at Princess Diana, the extraordinary woman of the 20th century. Featuring unique interviews and touching clips, this portrait captures her incredible journey to fame and her ability to overcome the emotional and physical challenges she encountered nearly every day.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E01 - Into the Unknown
programme.desc: In the season premiere, brothers Chris and Casey Keefer are dropped in the wilderness of New Zealand with virtually nothing. They must quickly adapt to their new environment or face life threatening consequences.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E02 - White Water
programme.desc: The adrenaline has worn off for Chris and Casey, and the jet lag has set in. The brothers face frigid temperatures and unpredictable whitewater rapids. When they try to navigate the rough waterways, their safety is threatened.

programme.title: Been There All Along
programme.desc: After her public breakup, Charley, determined founder of a dating app, is near bankruptcy and teamed up with Liam, a self-assured and innovative marketing expert, to save her company.

programme.title: Love for Starters
programme.desc: To save her fathers lake-front restaurant, a talented interior designer must partner with the celebrity chef her father hired without her knowledge to revamp the place before time runs out.

programme.title: Just for Showmance
programme.desc: Follows Tara Thompson whose presenting career starts to stall, and agrees to go on a TV show to marry her perfect match, Joe, a man shes never met. But she secretly tries to track him down to clarify that the marriage is just for show.

programme.title: Let Love Grow
programme.desc: Landscape architect Evie has met her match with her new client, stubborn archaeologist Ryan, but his daughters love Evie, and she soon finds herself the unwitting victim of Operation Grow a Girlfriend.

programme.title: Falling for the Competition
programme.desc: Molly runs the local moms group and this year theyre entering the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year Contest. When a new to town dad, Ashley, sets up a rival dads group, their competitive natures cause competition in town.

programme.title: Hashtag Proposal
programme.desc: A fake marriage proposal between two strangers . When all the attention starts to help them with their struggling lives and businesses, Millie and Leo play pretend, while trying to ignore their feelings.

programme.title: The Love Advisor
programme.desc: Abby works as an assistant and writer of the popular podcast run by her former college friend Serena. Journalist comes from NYC to write about podcast and Serena. Abby starts to develop feelings, but Serena already has a plan for herself.

programme.title: Catfish Murder
programme.desc: Doing her best to balance a successful career with family life, a single moms world spirals out of control when her shy teenage son is arrested for the murder of a young woman from the same high school.

programme.title: Secret Lives of College Escorts
programme.desc: Eve and her friend sneak out for a party, but her friend winds up dead and Eve loses her college scholarship. Soon she finds a job to pay for tuition but her job was a front for the dangerous sugaring scheme that caused her friends death.

programme.desc: After graphics designer April gets into a car accident that leaves her boyfriend Patrick in a coma, she is subject to panic attacks. But does her new male friend have a hidden agenda?
